title: Title contenders eyeing win at Charlotte to ease pressure
text:
> Sports Title contenders eyeing win at Charlotte to ease pressure Kyle Busch looks on from the garage before practice for Saturday's NASCAR Sprint Cup series auto race at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. (AP Photo/Terry Renna)
